title: GGMP - simple multiplayer game
description:
GGMP v1.0 by L8

This is a simple multiplayer game made in game maker. 
It\\\&#039;s my first upload so plz leave a comment.^^

It\\\&#039;s a 2D game. You just run around and kill your oponent. In this version u have a pistol and greades.


This is the first version of the game. I\\\&#039;m working on a new version so leave a comment i you are intrestet. plz tell me whats good/bad.
Maybe in the next version:

-Knife
-Edit the map
-Medikits
-Barrels or something that will explode if you shoot on it.
-A bot

I\\\&#039;ts not very nice but plz try it!
...and sorry for my bad english
